properties.title: Changes in the Clirr Maven Plugin

release.action: A class loader with a plugins dependencies wasn't created properly.
Add extra source directories under report generation since Maven does not corretly pass them on.
Added the "comparisonArtifacts" parameter, which allows to use select arbitrary artifacts for comparison.
Snapshot builds are now ignored when selecting the predecessor.
An exception was thrown, if no previous version was found. This made it impossible to configure the plugin in parent projects. An error message is now logged instead.
A condition was inverted when checking, whether the user provided an artifact for comparison.
Added a docck compliant web site.
